item.description:
For the past half decade Dave Douglas has repeatedly been named trumpeter, composer, and jazz artist of the year by such organizations as the New York Jazz Awards, Down Beat, Jazz Times, Jazziz, and the Italian Jazz Critics' Society.

Join the Boston Jazz Meetup group on saturday, Oct. 22 to hear this amazing trumpet player perform with his eclectic group Keystone. For more info about Dave Douglas, visit his website http://www.davedougla...

The concert starts at 7:30pm, but we will meet in the lobby at 7pm. You are advised to purchase tickets in advance, and inform the Regattabar that you are with the "Jazz meetup" party, so that you will be seated at our table.

The Regattabar is located inside the Charles Hotel in Harvard Square. More info and directions can be found at http://www.regattabar...

For more information, see http://www.getshowtix...
item.name: The Boston Jazz October Meetup - Dave Douglas & Keystone at Regattabar
